snippet: Xavier Niel’s low-cost Web and mobile services have disrupted the established operators in France, but his goal is no less than to instill an entrepreneurial technology culture in the country.
abstract: Billionaire French Internet entrepreneur Xavier Niel says his goal is to instill a Web-based entrepreneurial culture in France; Free, his low-cost Web and mobile services company,  has disrupted established operators in the country while making the Internet affordable for millions of French consumers.
lead_paragraph: Xavier Niel’s low-cost Web and mobile services have disrupted the established operators in France, but his goal is no less than to instill an entrepreneurial technology culture in the country.

headline.seo: Xavier Niel, a Billionaire Who Breaks the Mold
headline.main: A Billionaire Who Breaks the Mold
headline.print_headline: A Hard-Charging Net Mogul Upsets French Rivals
